mods.railcraft.api.carts

Interface ILinkableCart


  • public interface ILinkableCart
    This interface should be implemented by any minecart that wishes to change the default linkage behavior. It is NOT required to be able to link a cart, it merely gives you more control over the process.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeAdjusted(EntityMinecart cart)
      Return false if linked carts have no effect on the velocity of this cart.
      boolean canLinkWithCart(EntityMinecart cart)
      Check called when attempting to link carts.

      Gets the distance at which this cart can be linked.
      float getOptimalDistance(EntityMinecart cart)
      Gets the optimal distance between linked carts.
      boolean hasTwoLinks()
      Returns true if this cart has two links or false if it can only link with one cart.
      boolean isLinkable()
      To disable linking altogether, return false here.
      void onLinkBroken(EntityMinecart cart)
      Called when a link is broken (usually).
      void onLinkCreated(EntityMinecart cart)
      Called upon successful link creation.

    • Method Detail

      • isLinkable

        boolean isLinkable()
        To disable linking altogether, return false here.
        Returns:
        True if this cart is linkable.

      • canLinkWithCart

        boolean canLinkWithCart(EntityMinecart cart)
        Check called when attempting to link carts.
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart that we are attempting to link with.
        Returns:
        True if we can link with this cart.

      • hasTwoLinks

        boolean hasTwoLinks()
        Returns true if this cart has two links or false if it can only link with one cart.
        Returns:
        True if two links

      • getLinkageDistance

        float getLinkageDistance(EntityMinecart cart)
        Gets the distance at which this cart can be linked. This is called on both carts and added together to determine how close two carts need to be for a successful link. Default = LinkageManager.LINKAGE_DISTANCE
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart that you are attempting to link with.
        Returns:
        The linkage distance

      • getOptimalDistance

        float getOptimalDistance(EntityMinecart cart)
        Gets the optimal distance between linked carts. This is called on both carts and added together to determine the optimal rest distance between linked carts. The LinkageManager will attempt to maintain this distance between linked carts at all times. Default = LinkageManager.OPTIMAL_DISTANCE
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart that you are linked with.
        Returns:
        The optimal rest distance

      • canBeAdjusted

        boolean canBeAdjusted(EntityMinecart cart)
        Return false if linked carts have no effect on the velocity of this cart. Use carefully, if you link two carts that can't be adjusted, it will behave as if they are not linked.
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart doing the adjusting.
        Returns:
        Whether the cart can have its velocity adjusted.

      • onLinkCreated

        void onLinkCreated(EntityMinecart cart)
        Called upon successful link creation.
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart we linked with.

      • onLinkBroken

        void onLinkBroken(EntityMinecart cart)
        Called when a link is broken (usually).
        Parameters:
        cart - The cart we were linked with.
